statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPVpnGateway) WHERE n.project_id = {PROJECT_ID} AND n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP VPN Gateways that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.
